pli-tv-pvr9:1.1: “The Buddha laid down the training rules for his disciples for ten reasons:
pli-tv-pvr9:1.2: for the well-being of the Sangha, for the comfort of the Sangha, for the restraint of bad people, for the ease of good monks, for the restraint of corruptions relating to the present life, for the restraint of corruptions relating to future lives, to give rise to confidence in those without it, to increase the confidence of those who have it, for the longevity of the true Teaching, and for supporting the training.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.1: The well-being of the Sangha is also the comfort of the Sangha.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.2: The comfort of the Sangha is also for the restraint of bad people.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.3: The restraint of bad people is also for the ease of good monks.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.4: The ease of good monks is also for the restraint of corruptions in the present life.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.5: The restraint of corruptions relating to the present life is also for the restraint of corruptions relating to future lives.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.6: The restraint of corruption relating to future lives is also to give rise to confidence in those without it.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.7: The giving rise to confidence in those without it is also to increase the confidence of those who have it.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.8: The increase in confidence of those who have it is also for the longevity of the true Teaching.
pli-tv-pvr9:2.9: The longevity of the true Teaching is also for supporting the training.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.1: The well-being of the Sangha is also the comfort of the Sangha.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.2: The well-being of the Sangha is also for the restraint of bad people.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.3: The well-being of the Sangha is also for the ease of good monks.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.4: The well-being of the Sangha is also for the restraint of corruptions relating to the present life.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.5: The well-being of the Sangha is also for the restraint of corruptions relating to future lives.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.6: The well-being of the Sangha is also to give rise to confidence in those without it.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.7: The well-being of the Sangha is also to increase the confidence of those who have it.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.8: The well-being of the Sangha is also for the longevity of the true Teaching.
pli-tv-pvr9:3.9: The well-being of the Sangha is also for supporting the training.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.1: The comfort of the Sangha is also for the restraint of bad people.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.2: The comfort of the Sangha is also the ease of good monks.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.3: The comfort of the Sangha is also for the restraint of corruptions relating to the present life.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.4: The comfort of the Sangha is also for the restraint of corruptions relating to future lives.

pli-tv-pvr9:4.8: The comfort of the Sangha is also for supporting the training.
pli-tv-pvr9:4.9: The comfort of the Sangha is also the well-being of the Sangha.

pli-tv-pvr9:5.4: The restraint of corruptions relating to future lives …
pli-tv-pvr9:5.5: The giving rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-pvr9:5.6: The increase in confidence of those who have it …
